place_description:
Editions Coffee Shop & Bookstore is a cozy haven where literature and caffeine connoisseurs come together. As you step inside, the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the scent of well-loved books, creating an inviting atmosphere that sparks creativity and relaxation.

The space is adorned with shelves stacked high with a curated selection of both new releases and timeless classics, inviting patrons to explore literary worlds while savoring a cup of their favorite brew. You can also find a selection of gently used books!

The coffee offerings are equally enticing, with expertly crafted espresso drinks, teas, and Lotus Energy drinks!

reviews_data.review_text: Eclectic, great vibes, friendly staff  a must visit in Kannapolis.
I understand author Caleb Wygal comes to your store in August.  Would love to see a notice or something when the date is announced.  I am a huge fan of his books.
My wife's new favorite place. She also picked up some yarn with exceptional assistance.
Cool place

A recent discovery, and it's now my go-to place. The customer service is fantastic every time. The inside atmosphere is relaxed and comfortable. It seems like a great place to work for a few hours. My oat milk latte is delicious eve time. I LOVE the gluten free & vegan snickerdoodle cookie so much! What a treat!
My favorite coffee house when I'm in town! Delicious coffee and the kindest employees!
Didn't go in for coffee / food, but a cute little bookstore! Surprisingly busy! Pretty good selection of books.

For a bookstore they do not know how to communicate well at all. Online said they were open today Christmas Eve from 7:00 to 12:00 I got there at 6:30 patiently waiting to go in and get a few last minute Christmas gifts went up to the door about 7:05 yes the door did say drive-thru open at 7:00 store opens at 9:00 it did not have a sign saying anything about holiday hours so I just figured maybe they didn't post it but it was posted online 7 to 12:00 about 7:10 after they looked at me a few times and did not acknowledge me I politely knocked on the door to get someone's attention they came to the door saying oh we're not open only the drive-thru. I said well online said you are open now from 7:00 to 12:00 it did not say anything about opening drive-thru at 7:00 and store at 9:00 and she's gave me a look like she didn't care and kind of brushed me off. Been there a few times worst service ever had

I love to seek out the independent bookstores! After dropping off my son to the train station, it was a really short walk to this bookstore/coffee shop. I met Jen, one of the managers. She is proud of this local bookstore, I would be, too. It's neat! Plenty of books, places to sit and enjoy some coffee & socializing with friends and family, maybe even meet for a book club.
She gave me a short tour of the bookstore and coffee shop (I found out their beans are roasted in Greensboro, NC). The baked goods are made by Honeybear bake shop in Charlotte. They have a few gluten-free options.

If you love books and coffee ! supporting local, this is for you er's

Josephine Local Guide  (JLG)

This is my favorite coffee shop in the area. Delicious coffee, a wonderfully cozy atmosphere inside, and a drive-thru for when you just want a cup on the go. They even have gluten-free bakery treats which is rare to find around here! I love this spot.
A little slow

Haven't even been here yet but I gotta say these one star reviews, priceless. Some insane takes out there shout out Rana for not buying and then speaking poorly about some teens who did do the same. Can't wait to check it out hope it's not a Christian bookstore
The absolute best coffee around, I can get sugar free chocolate mochas here, which is rare, most coffee shops dont carry sugar free chocolate anything!!!
Always nice to drop in for some delicious coffee.

This is such a cool place! GREAT coffee! AMAZING book selection, literally there is something for everyone in there! We do not live anywhere near this shop, but we will definitely be back when we come thru town!

The coziest new and used bookstore in the area. Friendly staff (and patrons!) who recognize regulars but are just as welcoming to newcomers. They're always open to discuss book recommendations or help figure out what to drink. Always seems like they're partnering with new local small businesses or adding something else to the store to keep it interesting (lately, fiber arts).

I've only ever had one problem with a drink, which could have been fixed with the addition of a syrup, but they offered to remake it instead. If they don't have what book you're looking for, they'll order it. Couldn't ask for a better spot *and* there's a drive-thru plus a rewards system. Love love love.

P.S. If you're new and looking for the entrance, there's an exit-only lane directly next to the building. The actual turn in entrance is just past the intersection light with a small sign, and you drive around back until you get to Editions on the end (there's an entrance from the parking lot back there).

Service is top tier! I absolutely love this place. The vibe is amazing. Very much gives a cozy and relaxing atmosphere. And did I mention the coffee is great! I recently started to lower my sugar intake and the baristas really do a good job at helping me with picking a good iced coffee. I've been to other places where the sugar free version will be undrinkable. Not here!
Very nice place to sit back drink tea/coffee/so good lemonaid. Staff is GREAT! Thnaks to Samantha for the knowledge on your tea drinks.
Thisnis a wonderful coffeehouse and bookstore all in one!
My favorite coffee shop! The best people, the best, coffee, and the best atmosphere. Its always the highlight of my day!

Cute little book store with a great variety of new and used books and friendly staff. Obsessed with the place to the point where my partner isn't surprised anymore whenever I leave the house I usually come home with more books.
Wonderful chai tea friendly service great people period

I have wanted to stop in for several years now- finally did & was served the best pumpkin spice latte I have ever had ! Absolutely delicious- don't drive by! Stop in! They also offer writing classes, events & arts! Beautiful coffee house!
My absolute favorite book store and coffee shop!
Love the old style bookstore of this place. I had a latte and it was really good too. Great place to find a used book or to grab a cup of coffee to relax.
It's not on the menu, but they have made me a strawberry cold foam matcha latte the last few days and can I just say.... ORDER IT. You won't regret it! Best matcha I've had in Kannapolis.
What a cute and fun little bookshop! Visited while on vacation, really love the inside use of space and offerings. Be aware the parking is a little tricky, but just look for the sign!

I have found my heaven on earth. Books, coffee and crochet group. I had a cold drink today, Watermelon Lemonade (I believe). So often I find the watermelon lost in drinks but not this one! So good and refeshing! Nice table areas. Great selection of books. We bought The Bookstore Cat and a Bob book for my granddaughter. I will be back when I.am by myself to stock upnon books, glorious books!!

Loved this place. It's a bookstore and a coffee house. The owner also told me she's remodeling and creating some spaces for activities/ events.

They have a wide drink menu and a rotating seasonal menu.

Staff was friendly and helpful.

There are always tables if you want to come in and work for a while, and the drinks never miss (although some are VERY sweet). I especially love their banana pudding frozen drink  Good selection of used books for around $5-10 near the tables in the back. They also have earrings handmade by a local business, some special edition books, stickers, tote bags, Magic/D&D merchandise, and baked goods/candy. My roommate and I always enjoy coming here to work on our creative projects or just relax for a while. Workers have always been friendly :)

HUGE bonus that they have a drive-thru--if you don't have time to stop and chill, I definitely still recommend grabbing a drink. Only cons are limited hours and a weird parking lot entrance (it's a good bit before/after the Editions building depending on the direction from which you're coming).

Overall my favorite coffee/book shop in the Concord and Kannapolis area!

I was excited about this little find but ended up disappointed. My salted caramel cold brew wasn't very good - it tasted like a watered down Keurig coffee. My husband, baby, and I were hoping to grab a drink and sit and chill but all the tables were full of mostly one person with a laptop so we decided to leave. They seemed to have a good collection of books but I felt discouraged to walk around and explore. The workers were friendly.

Great bookstore! Great coffee with lots of flavor options. Great environment.

My only wish is that they had better internet so I can work from the shop. Great place to read, not a great place to work due to internet quality for things like calls, which stinks because I love working from coffee shops!
Very good iced latte. Enjoyed LOTR Trivia!
Great book store and local coffee joint. I love their decaf iced lattes. They are outstanding!
It was pleasure meeting them and they are so nice and friendly

I recently visited Editions with my husband and daughter for Mother's Day, and it is amazing! The store offers a great selection of both new and second-hand books, catering to a variety of reading preferences. The staff was friendly and created a warm and inviting environment. Paired with a cup of iced coffee, I highly recommend this bookstore to book lovers of all kinds.
1000/10! So lovely and the staff was so helpful with finding me something that didn't have dairy! Would definitely return. My macchiato was incredible and so pretty :)

I really enjoy this place, only this morning there was absolutely nowhere to sit down and enjoy it. Every table was full, which is great for business but sad for the book lover in me that wanted to destress with a book before my busy week starts again tomorrow.
I like the new additions. A lot of new space, and eating and drinking options.

I dropped by this morning because my power went out. I come here from time to time and pick up a book and/or a coffee. It's a place full of welcoming and comforting vibes. The best bookstore in Kannapolis, based out of a remodeled home from the 1920s. If you're an avid book reader in Kannapolis, come here to find your people.

Editions is a delightful combination of a cozy bookstore and a vibrant coffee shop. The employees are friendly and welcoming, adding to the warm atmosphere of the place. The bookstore boasts a great selection of books, catering to a variety of interests and tastes. Whether you're a bookworm looking for your next read or just seeking a quiet spot to enjoy a cup of coffee, Editions has you covered. Speaking of coffee, their brews are top-notch, ensuring a delightful experience with every sip. Overall, Editions is a must-visit for book lovers and coffee enthusiasts alike.

Not a satisfied customer.  I purchased two books for my Granddaughter. The issue is that I ordered a Cappuccino which was really weak, hardly any coffee taste at all. I've had Cappuccino coffee before and this missed the mark. It was practically all foam. I didn't drink from it and asked for something else. I was met with resistance, even after giving a tip. Nope, will not return here ever.
So cozy, Everyone is friendly & their book selection has gotten so big.

Great local gem and downtown treasure! Iced lattes are consistently well made and flavorful. My favorites are the Bookend and the Fine Line, both with cinnamon on top.

There's a good variety of books, a nice children's section and several locally made items like artisan soaps, candles and even a 3D printed dragon sculpture with moveable joints. Multiple monthly events. Come for the coffee, stay a while for the Editions experience, which is simply a pleasure.
Local bookstore/coffee shop.
Quiet place to hang out with people or read a nice book.

Stopped in just before closing. Staff was friendly and offered assistance while browsing. They helped me search for the titles I was interested in and were knowledgeable about various books, and I enjoyed discussing several books and recommendations as I checked. I didn't get a chance to enjoy their coffee/food but it smelled wonderful inside!

Excellent coffee! We ordered the Book Ends Latte & the Frosty's Favorite & both were superb. They also make their own whipped cream, in house. Very quaint & adorable bookstore with knowledgable staff about the books. Winner!!

Not to be dramatic, but this place makes the BEST coffee I have ever had. I dreamed about it last night, so naturally had to grab a cup from their drive through this morning. Caramel Macchiato is my go to. Always impressed with their smiles and customer service. I MUST visit!

You need to go check this place out! We had such a great time wandering through the books with a delicious cup of coffee.  They have both used and new books and plenty of seating to work or read.   They also have a used book program where you'll get half credit on the book to be used towards another book.  I'm so glad this little gem exists.

Very welcoming cozy bookstore. Small outdoor sitting area and a few areas to read. Pricing is decent.
Got a small caramel oatmilk latte and it was delicious. Oatmilk didn't have the overwhelming oat taste and was creamy
The cinnamon muffins and caramel macchiato are yummy.

I love visiting this book store every time I leave for the Kannappolis train station. I stopped by again with my family just a couple days ago at the end of my Thanksgiving break. The seasonal drink selection is fantastic and the atmosphere in here is amazing. It's a great place to study or just enjoy yourself and relax. It's typically relatively quiet, and there's plenty of great books to occupy your time. Overall, this place has everything you could ask for in a small coffee shop and bookstore, and it's a fun little place to stop by if you're in the area.
Loved the bookstore feel with the nice seating areas to enjoy a latte and a good book.

Nice indie book store with a nice mix of general interest books. Staff is friendly and the drinks and pastries are pretty good.

Recommended.

Expensive coffee for barley any coffee!!! I have been here before, so I know what I typically get. Its been a little inconsistent lately but today makes me forever stop giving them another chance! *Full review below*
So this morning I got my coffee after paying $7 (and tipping) when I get home I pick the cup up and automatically think this doesn't feel right, (at the window its too hot to hold so I quickly place it down) but when I open it up I took automaticically took a picture of it b.c its like your cheating your customers! I hate when you want to support the small business but you get this! I got a 2nd picture with a pencil to show how much was missing after what I guess you will say was "full of whip cream" which it shouldn't be that much, again I was a regular customer for 5 years especially for specialty holiday drinks so I know what it typically feels like and this was worth the price of a small not medium. I will no longer spend my $ here. * Thanks but no thanks! *
Nice place to get a coffee and hang out while waiting for a broken down Amtrak train!

Everything was perfect about this coffee shop.  The service was wonderful.  My coffee was made to perfection.  The shop itself is inviting and full of books to choose from.  There are so many things to look at, one could spend hours here!
Dandy!
Best coffee ever. I moved out of Kannapolis and I still drive here from Charlotte when I can. Their Frappuccino's are amazing, my toddler is in love with the orange creamsicle Frappuccino
Great service, fantastic drinks and pleasant atmosphere.

Coffee was delicious and everyone working was very friendly and helpful. They had some free games and puzzles to play while enjoying the coffee. Atmosphere was relaxed and lovely, everything you'd want from a coffee shop-book store.
This has quickly become my favorite book stop. The used books are in great quality for amazing price
Delicious coffee and immaculate vibes! Left with a hefty stack of books and a huge smile. Definitely coming back asap
Very pleasant  environment.  Great variety of books from adult to children
First time in and this will be my regular bookstore now.
Cutest little new and used bookstore with great coffee options, in an old mill house. Today was our first visit but we will definitely be back. Loved it!

This is a lovely place to grab a coffee and snack or find a used book. For Pokemon Go lovers there are many gyms accessable from inside. If you're in a hurry they have a convenient drive thru as well.
Cute little bookstore with a cute coffee shop. The employees are very knowledgeable about their selection & very helpful with any recommendations.
Accepting of ALL

Ordered an iced latte. Was pretty good. Service would have me coming back again and again...well, anytime I visit the Kannapolis area via Amtrak. Very cute bookstore and all of a 2 to 3 min walk from Amtrak station. They were having a local author book signing the day I went to visit! Love the local community support.  Will be back.

WE LOVE THIS PLACE  Kannapolis needed this little gem. When our family comes to visit, they always stop in to get the best coffee in town. We also enjoy the coffee & Danishes... oh and did I mention books?? Yes! Many good reads & great prices. They have used & new! Such a great place to go for a bit of relaxation and caffeine
Without a doubt the best coffee shop around. Kannapolis is so lucky to have this place!!

So, my first time here, I told them that, and you better bring your own food. Only cookies, muffins, chips really minimal. I stood at the counter and had no idea where they went to make my coffee. This place started as a good spot to study until the teenager's came and sat behind me. My computer is out with apple air pods in and I couldn't drown out the conversation. I don't think they took a breath, talking for a complete hour, and are very inconsiderate and rude. Clearly, they are not reading or buying books in this book store. Do. not come here to study.
Love everytime we go. The coffee is amazing and we always find a new book or two

This is a really fun house turned book store. They have great coffee and smoothies, and an excellent selection of new and used books. They do lots of trivia night events as well as story times for younger kids. One of my favorite places to visit.

I'm a native and this is my favorite place to treat myself. They have muffins, bagel, cookies, and so much more! I don't like books but this place makes me like books if that makes sense. All the workers are great, and the drinks are amazing. <3 love you guys!!
Everyone here is pro! Top notch service. It always feels like a cozy corner with a coffee and a book. The staff is kind and helpful, the coffee is great, and soo many books.... local craft also.
It is a nice cozy place with a good selection of used and new books.

This place is HEAVEN! Their Grand Slam iced latte is delicious & under $7 for a large!!!

Recently has a Apple danish and chocolate muffin and they were both better than I expected! ($2.95 each)

I love supporting a small business and I love that I can send my lightly used books their for a create for their thrift section as well!!!!
Cute bookstore ! Loved that they had authors advertising their books on the day I went.
I love this place, they are so kind and they also give good smoothies! I felt so at home and it's quiet, I'm in love.

A fantastic bookstore and coffee shop combo! They offer new and used books of all varieties, no genre shaming! There's also ample choices of coffee and flavoring (seriously, the list is three columns long on a regular sheet of paper). If you don't have time to pop in, they also have a drive thru window for coffee purchases. They also hold a variety of events every month and are a store filled with joyous and helpful staff. Definitely recommend!
Love this place and everyone who I've met working here!

You will find this place awesome if you are found of books and coffee! My kid who loves stories found what she looked for here and enjoyed herself. The books prices are reasonable. The staff are very kind and friendly. The only thing that I enjoyed less is the amount of sugar in the cookies, otherwise it would be perfect.
Best coffee in all of Kannapolis with hands down the SWEETEST, most caring workers I've ever met. 10/10 every time

Went to this amazing little gem today wanting something different than coffee. The barista Jenn recommended the Blarney Stone as a nod to Mardi Gras. Highly recommend!  If was a frozen key lime flavored treat!  I perused the bookstore while I waited (not a long wait at all) and found a true crime novel by my favorite author John Douglas. Jenn and Scott were great book conversationalist as they were extremely knowledgeable and recognized John Douglas and his work (not many do). Again, highly recommend this cozy friendly place for great drinks and books!

Super sweet people running this establishment and a huge selection of books for all types of readers. I love the kids section for my toddlers and the non-fiction for myself. The muffins are absolutely heavenly and everything is reasonably priced. Definitely making it a regular stop on my commute.
Great place people where very friendly.

Great place to browse and buy a book, grab a cup of coffee and work a little (they have free Wi-Fi). The staff is friendly and clientele is quiet which are great for working! Definitely stopping here next time I'm in the area.
Coffee was great . Service was great everyone was friendly. Husband was looking for a bible .they just gave it to him.
Love the atmosphere and the coffee is great!

Coffee is good, no issues with that. The low rating, however, is due to inconsistency in the sizes of their drinks. I've gone consistently to this coffee shop over the course of the last year, and at first there were no issues. But as of the last 3 maybe 4 trips, we've begun to pick up on the sizing of the drinks we're receiving as totally different than previous times. The same drink is ordered each visit, and it's always a large  macchiato & a small coffee of some variance. The first visits, the large was consistent with what anyone would consider a large coffee from a smaller shop, but now the large is DRASTICALLY smaller, I'd say in comparison, it's roughly in between a Starbucks Tall & Grande. The small cup has stayed the same throughout each trip, so that doesn't seem to have changed. At this point, we've unfortunately chalked it up to the young people working the drive thru window, expecting to be tipped & when they are familiar with a vehicle that doesn't routinely tip, they decide they'll take it upon themselves to charge us for a large, but serve us with a reg. (Medium) size or smaller. The tip culture in this world has gotten completely absurd, if we felt as if you as a barista DESERVED a tip, you would have gotten one... but things like this are the main reason we don't believe everyone deserves a tip. Say we had tipped, we'd be left leaving the shop with an unpleased transaction of receiving half the coffee we paid for. We love supporting small businesses, which is why we've chose to come back time & time again, to only be served with a repeat of the same issue. $13 spent on two small coffees is a bit unreasonable considering there are copious amounts of alternative coffee spots in the area that will match their pricing with their sizing. All in all, your baristas should have received their much needed tips in the midst of their eager overcharging, & UNDER providing of the correct amount of coffee purchased.
Friendly service, nice variety, good time
Amazing place! Coffee and books, what more could you want?! The staff was amazing and so sweet! Try the Grand Slam, sooo good!
Great experience

!Este lugar es una joya escondida! Tenian delicioso cafe especial y menu de temporada. Tambien tienen delicias como galletas, danes, cake pops y brownies. Gran seleccion de libros y juegos de mesa. Tienen una gran lista de eventos de trivia programados para el ano. Hay rincones de lectura/trabajo disponibles.

My son and I absolutely love this place they are always so nice and welcoming and the coffee is always great with an awesome selection of books I find something for my little man every time we go and they're always super courteous to us and go out of their way to make our experience awesome
Hands down one of the cutest coffee shops in the area!  I really enjoyed my visit.
Loved, loved this place

Dang, this Karen...I mean ERICA in the reviews needs to check herself.  This place is great.  These keyboard warriors kill me. Just because you can say it doesn't mean you should.   Thankful for a local coffee shop that isn't a big brand and very reasonable in price.  Keep it up!   Erica. Don't. Go. Back. We definitely don't need anymore input from you.

Excellent coffee and pastries, wide selection of new and used books, and truly family-friendly and comfortable. Staff also had great energy and were kind. This is a lovely place I can't wait to return to!
New and used books, excellent coffee drinks, and pip culture galore. What's not to love?

Could spend hours in this place Not loving the parking and access but still very cool atmosphere and even cooler inventory they have brand new AND used books and offer trades ( not $for $ ask the owner for info on trading )
Please correct your hours on Google. Been by twice before 7 a.m. and have been closed both times.
My favorite place in town

Worst family to own a coffee shop! Greedy and humiliating. I am an extremely positive person. The boy that has parents that own the shop is the rudest child I have met in a coffee house, coffee is a time for peace and chat. Not a time to listen to the child of the owners laugh at you and talk about you. Mind you this child must be over 20 , sad , sad coffee house if you want to call it that....
There is a wonderful and happy coffee house right around the corner if you like to be treated as a human. FRENCH EXPRESS !Their coffees are consistent and truly delicious! Not to mention the staff really cares about its customers. They laugh with you not at you. Thank you FRENCH EXPRESS , Editions cannot begin to touch the awesomeness FRENCH EXPRESS COFFEE carries in the air , in the coffees , bakery items , smoothies and more....
I give no stars to Editions Coffee. Too bad they are in our precious town here in Kannapolis!
Once again I am thankful FRENCH EXPRESS is right around the corner from EDITIONS .FrenchExpress is great to lounge, read, chat, one can even bring their DOGGIES INSIDEat FRENCH EXPRESS . Equipped with a drive thru window. Do not waste your time , your kindness or money at EDITIONS!
Side note- I stopped through EDITIONS the other day to see if possibly they would be nice and my gals and I can meet there again.
Unfortunately, they absolutely did not like the fact I arrived 16 minutes before the store was to close at 2 pm. So I ordered my coffee and was sternly told " no, we cannot serve anything but regular brew!!" So I was looking at the menu, trying to figure out a different drink. I drink decaf. I asked if she could make my drink with regular brewed coffee as she said was my only choice.
I asked for decaf , which is what I drink if the store cannot serve it , est la vive.
I was ready for my treat so I figured that she d figure out a great solution. Still positive,Well, her next comment " we cannot do decaf." My eyes gazed back at the menu. She started to mumble " well maybe I could make it for you but you do understand that we are closing and I have already broken down the machines. So! I ll just have to reclean !?"She stared at me w waiting for an answer and I said " great! Thank you so much!!
She was not happy to say the least.
Just a report.
I ll stop by again in some months.

Love this place! Great for selling used books and buying more used books. I wish the credit could be used for the full price of new-to-me books, but I understand why they do it the way they do.
Good coffee, too!
Fantastic coffee. My daughters claim the hot chocolate here is the best on earth. Wonderful customer service. And dog friendly.
Super amables y geniales!
Purchased 2 coffees at the drive thru, totally satisfied with the quality and service !
Cute little book store with good coffee and a great atmosphere.
Editions is an amazing place to come work and have some coffee or other drinks/snacks! If you are a remote worker and looking for a place to sit, this is your spot!
I have been ordering from Editions for almost 2 years. They are consistent with great suggestions and customer service! Thanks! This time I tried the Summer Joy! It reminded me of a Creamsicle!

Coffee was good, pretty good book selection, prices on both were great. Felt very comfortable the first time. Definitely looking forward to watching them grow. Book varieties of all sorts, bulk of it is fiction, lots of romance novels, not a lot of non-fiction, hope the variety will be come more balanced in future. Coffee also in wide varieties, cold, hot, fancy, plain, strong, sweet etc. Over all just a nice place to kill some time, enjoy a beverage, and maybe find a new favorite book to crack open.

Update: YOU CAN TRADE IN USED BOOKS ON TUESDAYS! See the owner for details but this makes a huge difference! Part of what stops me from buying books is not enough shelf space, but if I can trade in ones that weren't good enough to keep...GAME CHANGER. Also coffee is still really good, my wife may be an addict...

They have done some rearranging, but still a huge variety. Slightly smaller non-fiction section but we still keeps finding gems we hadnt expected. Also try the trivia events! There are so many different ones!
Trivia games, many coffee options, and a variety of used books!
Lavender vanilla iced latte made with oat milk - unbelievably delicious!  Great place to sit and enjoy it
Better than Starbucks or dunkin!!
Cozy place

This place is a hidden gem! They had delicious specialty coffee and seasonal menu. They also have treats like cookies, danish, cake pops and brownies. Great selection of books and board games. They have a big list of trivia events lined up for the year. Reading/working nooks are available.
Trivia was a blast. Loved my mango smoothie.

By far one of my favorite book stores ever. They remembered me after my first visit and are always friendly and welcoming! I was lucky enough to attend their spring pop up event and we had an absolute blast. Great place to chill out, sip on your coffee and read a good book.
Stopped in for coffee. Ended up with coffee, books and a candle. Great atmosphere. Friendly ladies working. We will be back!
Love the coffee's and the employees are very friendly! Great selection of books also.
Great chai tea. Neat local book store.

This coffee shop and bookstore hybrid is such a charming spot! There's an excellent selection of books and coffee, seating with great lighting and a comforting atmosphere. Additionally, Editions engages in additional community involvement events such as trivia nights, book club meetings, writing workshops, and even charity raffles.
The repurposed house also has a drive thru option for your more rushed cafe needs, but if you have time, a seat by the window is such a pleasant experience.
Best coffee ever!

Great atmosphere, selection of used/new books, local handmade gifts. Good prices too! Grabbed a latte to go - unfortunately didn't have much time to spare.  Latte was delicious!  Staff is very friendly and helpful. Can't wait to go back!
We stopped by on a whim, what a nice little coffee shop! Just on our stop there was an author signing their books for fans and the Cannonballers mascot with a book reading for children.
Absolutely amazing!!! I can't believe I have been missing out on the best coffee around. And not to mention the staff is so helpful and kind. Will definitely recommend it to everyone!

UPDATE: The Local and Monthly Themed Lattes are amazing! They always have a couple of milk/nondairy options available. I will miss them when we move!

Great LOCAL coffee shop with amazing baristas.
Lots of potential, closes way too early...5pm.

I love Editions! As a local indie author, it can be really hard to find bookstores willing to display my books, but Editions has been SO supportive of me and tons of other authors! Not only do they have a section of books from local authors, but they also host book signings. They also have a weekly writer's group that has been a great resource for me. Not to mention, the coffee is always fantastic, and they're always switching out the seasonal flavors. Love this place! <3
this is probably one of my girlfriends favorite coffee shop! she loves how nice everyone is and she enjoys the book store also!

The vibe and the coffee is good. The concept is really cool.
The internet for a coffee shop cafe? Basically not existing: 1-3mbps. Concept is cool but with those speeds basically study or do meetings elsewhere.
Fell in love with this cute little coffee shop. And the large book selection they have
The staff is always friendly and that atmosphere  is relaxing
This was my first time visiting Editions and it was a great surprise. Loved the staff, coffee was great and we got to network a little about my book, Reality Check! I'll definitely return.

This place is what I want my house to look and smell like. Books from wall to wall and the ever present scent of fresh coffee . I have never tried a beverage or snack here that I haven't liked. Everyone is very friendly and the customer service is .

Charming, Wonderful ambience. Outstanding staff. Located in a converted house, with rooms lined with bookshelves of used books. Tables interspersed  with tables for customers to enjoy their coffee and browse the extensive collection of pre owned books.  I'll definitely be back.
Great place to spend time browsing the wide selection of books while having a good cup of coffee and enjoying one of their bakery items. Friendly, welcoming staff who provide good service.

This is one of my new favorite places! they've converted a home on Main Street in downtown Kannapolis into a New/Used book store, with a gourmet coffee shop and lots of seating areas. The books are spread throughout the place, so you have to look a bit to find the genre you're looking for, but they have LOTS of them. They will take trade-ins for store credit, and they also sell new books, and some cool merchandise! They are definitely worth visiting....next time I plan to go when I have more time to explore! OH...and the coffee is AMAZING!! The only less positive thing I can say is that I was not comfortable looking for books on the shelves in the seating/restaurant area....there were lots of people at the tables, and it felt intrusive to try to stand virtually right beside strangers enjoying their coffee and scour over a book shelf. Other than that, just great!
Best book store in the Charlotte area!  Fantastic coffee and sitting area and the book selection is phenomenal.
A lovely locally owned business that I enjoy supporting. Always a peaceful place to enjoy a beverage + access free WiFi. I bought a gift card today as a stocking stuffer.

Great bookshop on the edge of downtown Kannapolis.  Plenty of onsite parking and they have a drive thru. They carry a lot of used and new books, plus items made by local artisians(candles, soap, Elderberry syrup,  glassware, paintings, etc). Big selection of kids items. Large selection of coffees, teas, frappes, smoothies, and bottled beverages. They have a big selection of pastries and snacks. Would be great to see more substantial food like soup or sandwiches.  Bathrooms were very clean. Staff is very friendly and helpful. If you become a regular, they will make you feel like part of the family. Even a casual visitor will be made to feel very welcome. Lots of seating and tables. Free wifi.  They also do lots of events like book signings,  trivia, kids events. Fun relaxing place to come hang out for awhile. They are pet friendly so you can bring the doggos for a pup cup.

When you pull up to the drive thru and it's 4:58. You don't know until that moment that they changed their hours back, and they are turning the sign to say closed. They close at 5:00. It's hard to support local when this is the second time I've had a drive thru issue. Super disappointing.
Okay spot I guess. Was nice to relax there for a couple minutes in the morning get a cup of coffee close to the house, I stopping spot on the morning bike ride.
Fun Place! Great Pumpkin Latte!
Cool vibe, super nice staff, great book selection, great coffee

too many rules and limitations on how credit can be used- you can only use credit towards 50% of a purchase, and it cannot be used on new books. I've never been to a bookstore where this is the case, and nobody mentioned these rules to me beforehand. i regret selling to them and wish i could take it back.
Love it here! So homey and the owners are so sweet!

Selection of coffee (hot, cold, frozen), smoothies, frappuccinos, blends are all good. Very happy and up beat staff always lloking to take your order and on top of their game. Definitely a perfect drive thru coffee shop stop.
Yummy..different selections of coffee
Good coffee and muffin
The coffee was very good and the employees were very kind...
Good book store and a coffee bar inside is a good idea

I am sad I was only able to spend a few minutes here as I would have loved to look around! My Chai was great and they were able to make my boyfriend a custom smoothie. It's very cozy and the bathroom was clean as well. Next time I'm in Kannapolis I can hopefully revisit!
The coffee is great!  Friendly, comfortable, and a pleasant place to enjoy with friends!
A local favorite
My wife and I always get coffee here and our kids love their customers drinks as well. Wonderful people and fast and tasteful coffee as well recommend this for sure.
WE LOVE THIS COFFEE PLACE. They even remember my order when they see me.

Amazing place to lose your sense of time and slip back for an hour or four with some coffee and books. The coffee is great and fairly-priced (the iced mocha was delicious if a bit too sweet). The place is pretty spacious with a variety of different seating areas allowing you to peruse through books while enjoying a coffee. I would have loved a greater travel selection, with coverage beyond the US, along with more travel literature. Their fiction collections seem to be more exhaustive.

Thought it was good at first. Coffee was good. Not a comfortable place.
.
This place is so sweet! Order the caramel oatmilk latte it's delicious. The book selection is kids through adult and there are a few cute seating areas indoor and outdoor.
cutest place and great coffee, love it!
Great oat milk latte and a yummy wild berry smoothie. And cute bookstore
Lovely local coffee house. Friendly and respectful staff.  Neat and organized. Nice place to meet a friend for coffee or tea.
So cute! Coffee is great and atmosphere is super cozy!
Friendly staff and great service
Very good
Neat bookstore

So glad I finally got to visit! It's so cute and everyone is so warm and friendly. There's such a good selection of books and it's within walking distance of downtown Kannapolis. The coffee was super yum and the place really cozy if you want to sit and take in the atmosphere. Can't wait to come again!

When I think about the perfect place to have coffee I think about Editions. I've loved it over the years and was so excited when they remodeled and added a drive through--more to love!

Their iced Nitro Coffee Nudge with sweet cream is my absolute favorite. Bring your dog--mine absolutely loves getting her "puppuccino"!!!

If you're into books then you'll definitely find something to read here. I've brought in some of my well kept books and had them exchanged for credits so I can get more books--what a concept. :)

Editions is an awesome local business. I am so happy it's here in Kannapolis!
Love their coffee!
love the place! great vibe,  tons of books,  trivia tournaments and local authors frequent this place.  It's great
Delicious coffee and wonderful ambiance. I grew up in this house. Awesome to be able to come back and sit in the living room and have a coffee and good book!
Good coffee, a nice collection of books, and helpful staff.
Lovely place. Great coffee. Kind employees. The only thing I can find wrong with it is that the book genres are poorly labeled.
Great coffee and employees...so many great priced books. Very comfortable place to relax.
The people that work here and run the place are amazing people. Great place great service great coffee.

Best local specialty coffee and book store.  They have great drinks and I  love the books. It part used/trade a book but also new books. They have lots of events with local artist. And lots of family events.
Great coffee and seasonal drink options and the convenience of a drive thru is a plus. There is also a great selection of books to browse and WiFi to get school/work done.
Great coffee and great staff! A wonderful place to sit and read or catch up with a friend. I love that I can take my puppy in!
Omg best little coffee house

This is such a cool place! The staff are really friendly and down to earth and the coffee is good. The wifi was a little spotty the day I went, but I think on a normal day it would be a great place to work, and I love the tables by the big windows. The book selection and prices are also pretty good - a few too many of the cheap romance novels, but if you dig around a bit, there's a good selection. I'll definitely be back!

LOVE THIS PLACEEEEEE!!!!!!

Update after 1 yr: I STILLL LOVE THIS PLACE! Their coffee tastes SO good!! This place wins over them all.

I LOVE Editions Coffe and Bookstore. It's very difficult for me to get a coffee, unless there is a drive-thru. Editions has one and it's so convenient for this Grammy when I have my Grands!
Their coffee is delish and they have MANY choices! They even have baked goods which my Grandson loves! (Chocolate Chip Cookies) I think their prices are good and all the folks who work there are really nice!
Amazing coffee! Incredible service! Cozy atmosphere! A perfect spot to connect with a friend or grab a book and enjoy some alone time. Love this place!
This place is super cozy and MAGICAL!
Such a darling place. Great coffee, cozy space and very friendly staff.
Quaint place to go to catch up on a good book and the drinks are pretty good too Smoothies, Frappes and the pumpkin spice.

Such an adorable coffee shop! I usually go through the drive through and order an iced bookend latte but this time I went inside. They have a large assortment of books as well as novelty/gift items. The prices are more than reasonable. Glad I took the time to check out everything this place has to offer!
This place is amazing great coffee, a great selection of books priced reasonably and a nice and cozy atmosphere.

Excellent service
Variety
Location
Super cute, Carmel creme Brule frap is amazing
Great selection of books !!
Charming little place with one of the best lattes I've ever had!
best iced vanilla latte
This shop is amazing! An absolutely charming interior, friendly staff, and a huge selection of books to choose from!!! I cannot recommend this store enough.
Good selection of gently read books as well as great coffee!
I got a XLg Iced Decaf Caramel Macchiato. This was my first time here but it will NOT be my last!! My Goodness my drink is DELISH!!! I Highly recommend this place
Love this place!  Very charming and they have GREAT selection of books.  I can't believe it took me so long to find Editions.  We will definatly be back soon.
The additions coffee house is the best in Kannapolis! All of these people that work there are very friendly!:-)
Great coffee, Fun employees, Good Books

First time to this cozy and inviting coffee shop and book store. I enjoyed a nice iced coffee after an F3 workout in K-town with some new friends. It's a great local coffee shop, with fresh brewed coffee, espresso blended drinks, and lots of other treats. There were lots of seats available nested in among the sprawling bookstore. A great place to relax and hang out after a grueling F3 workout. I will definitely be back!
Love this place, coffee is great. I can browse the shelves for hours.
Great coffee and cookies!
Always a pleasure to meet here and connect with the great staff. We call it a second office for quick meetings over coffee.
Great cozy little Nook when you're looking for some peace and quiet and great customer service. :-)! There are books of all kind for everyone. I will definitely be back soon.
Cute and cozy with a large selection of books.
First time visiting. Charming bookstore with great coffee.
Cool coffee shop and book store. The walls are lined with bookshelves and they have a fantastic local author's section.
So cozy!! Did a harry potter trivia there and was very enjoyable!!

What a charming and cozy book shop and coffee shop. Walls lined with books rooms,  lined with books,  a fantastic old house that's been completely remade into a place that you could browse books endlessly with a delicious cup of coffee. You could spend quite a long time here just going room to room looking at the array of books available. The front porch has been made into a seating area where you can have coffee and a pastry. Looking forward to many visits here.
Very neat place to get older and used books
Great coffee and staff. Neat place for books and coffee
Service is good and coffee tastes fresh
Delicious caramel macchiato and great customer service

This is a very unique place. I felt very "at home" as soon as I walked in AND I'm from Pennsylvania, not a local. I asked about the coffee and I got a free lesson about the different styles of coffee. I ended up getting a Carmel latte that was very good.
It is a book store, new and used. I was told it was also an outlet for local authors.
I had a great time with the employees. I'll be back when I get back in your town!!!
Delicious coffee,  easy to get to,  friendly staff,  and a wonderful setting with the used books.
We LOVE this coffee shop! Books everywhere for you to browse. Tons of seating areas in their own semi-private nooks... very charming. The staff are always very friendly as well

Went there yesterday. Such an inviting atmosphere and a great place to sit down and read a book and drink your coffee. Located right next to Kannapolis' modernizing downtown area, it fits in perfectly. Excited to go back again soon
Couldnt find a table/ seat last time I went realize this is also doubles as a bookstore with little room but it could do with a few more tables / chairs
Awesome staff.  A comfortable place to socialize.  Wide selection of books, and great beverages.  I wish I had found this place sooner.
Cute and adorable place
Amazing place, I really loved it, it is excellent, they have friendly staff, the place is quiet and cozy, thousands of book options to buy and delicious coffee.
Good vibes. Cute cafe. Good coffee. Not so good snacks or food.
Delicious coffee.  Good comfortable environment and good books in abundance!!!
Greatest little coffee shop and bookstore in Kannapolis North Carolina
Nice place to grab a coffee and has an extensive reading room / library of books.

I absolutely love this place! Not only can you get a tasty drink and read a couple of books, but occasionally they have local vendors/artists stop by with their goods and services. The staff is also friendly.
First time there, to see if it would be suitable for a small Meetup get together. They close too early for our needs.
Not my place to chill

We just started a knit/crochet/yak it up thing on Tuesdays from 4:30 to close...had a great time. Marvelous mango smoothie...hated to leave!!!
Great place to just hang out, books or no books. And artwork, pottery, glasswork...
I'm short...check it out. Join us on Tuesdays. Heck, I can even help you with basic knit stuff...just ask Dawn
There are a great place for a cup of coffee and a good book. The staff is very nice and helpful. You will love Editions.
It's a great bookstore! Lots of good choices and they have used books as well.
This place is a treasure! The caramel crunch frappe was amazing and there are SO MANY books!!! Friendly helpful staff make you feel welcome as soon as you go in!
Great atmosphere to be creative and consume caffeine

The atmosphere is perfect,  I really enjoyed my iced latte and my cake. I love the set up and the location.

The staff was friendly and inviting!
Amazing coffee and staff! Love all the books too!
Great coffee! Wouldn't hesitate to stop by again!
A great place for some me time
Fantastic local little gem! Love it! Great service and pet friendly.
I love this place!!!!! One of the best coffee shops I've ever been to!!
So cute and quiet!
Best coffee shop and bookstore in North Carolina.
Great coffee,great books,great folks.....we love it! !!!!

Here it is, 2 PM and I'm getting sleepy. I obviously searched for "coffee near me," on Google and this place popped up. Let me tell you, this place is GREAT! I didn't ha e enough time to grab a book and read, but you can definitely do it here. The coffee was fantastic. I got an Americano, which I always do no matter where I go. The service was incredibly friendly and the parking was great. Plenty of it behind the building. Enjoy!
Super cozy like bookstore and coffee shop with a pretty decent selection. Definitely a great place to sit with a good book
Smells good
